body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? during your upkeep step, Dominus of Fealty prompts you to gain control of target "creature". Card text states: Gain control of target "permanent". magarena lets you choose target permanent, it's just a wrong notification. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Dominus of Fealty: notification error
content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 13, 2014 23:31:58_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? during your upkeep step, Dominus of Fealty prompts you to gain control of target "creature". Card text states: Gain control of target "permanent". magarena lets you choose target permanent, it's just a wrong notification. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=515_
